message: Let's split it evenly, no need to negotiate. Accept and we can be done!
You're not being generous enough, let's try again!
You're getting closer, but I still think I deserve more!
I'm willing to give you a bit more, but don't expect me to give away the farm!
I'm starting to think you're not serious about negotiating, let's see if you can do better!
Let's call a truce, Bob. I'll give you an even split. No more negotiations!
